flawed_nl_solution:
After losing one of the pages you have 12 - 1 = <<12-1=14>>14 pages of stickers.
If each page has 20 stickers on it, you have 14 x 20 = <<14*20=280>>280 stickers.
#### 280

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
